features.additionalInfo: Have easy access to your money with a Platinum Debit Mastercard with no foreign transaction fees and no overseas ATM fees. It's available to Australian citizens and temporary or permanent residents over 16 with an Australian residential address (limited exceptions may apply subject to conditions).
You can have more than one card linked to an account.
Get paid faster and easier by sending your mobile number and email address instead of your BSB and account number.
Over the counter transactions available at Bankwest branches.
You can bank over the phone.
You can use BPAY  to quickly and easily pay your bills online.
You can set up direct debits.

PayTo is a service that's been developed by the NPPA (New Payments Platform Australia) that businesses, service providers and merchants can opt in to. Essentially, it's a digital way for customers to pre-authorise payments from their bank accounts in real time, for things like utilities, subscriptions and memberships.
You can link up to 9 Bankwest Offset Transaction Accounts per loan, to bucket your money, nickname them and shuffle their priority and set goals in the Bankwest App.
Cheque Access is available, however will no longer be available as an optional facility for retail accounts issued on or after 16 June 2023.
Bank on the go with the Bankwest App. Use Bankwest Online Banking (BOB) to access your money and manage your everyday banking subject to conditions of use.

If you want to access your account in Online Business Banking, you will be provided with a separate Product Disclosure Statement and your use of the service will be a matter of separate agreement with us. Separate fees are applicable for this service.
Use Apple Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Apple device.
Use Fitbit Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Fitbit watch/tracker device.
Use Garmin Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Garmin watch/tracker device.
Use Google Pay from any compatible Android device to tap and pay on the go.
Use Samsung Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Samsung device.
Create goals, schedule transfers, and track your progress in our app.
Backed by Mastercard 24/7 Zero Liability Protection.
Set up Easy Alerts through the Bankwest App to get notified about important account activity.
Get paid faster and easier by transferring funds using your mobile number and email address instead of your BSB and account number.

Balances held in the Offset Transaction Account will offset interest charges when linked to an eligible home loan. Interest on your loan is calculated daily, so the more you have sitting in your offset account on any given day, the less interest you'll be charged. The portion of your balance that is offset against your loan depends on the loan type. For variable rate home loans, 100% of the balance will be offset. For fixed rate home loans, 40% of the balance will be offset.
If you have an eligible Complete Variable Home Loan or Complete Fixed Home Loan, you can quickly open single and joint offset accounts in the Bankwest App.
Other fees which the Bank charges for its services, including services not specific to this account but for which you may be charged are listed in our Bankwest Your Guide to Banking Fees brochure.
You can set up ongoing payments for things like bills or loan repayments.

constraints.additionalInfo: No minimum deposit required to open the account.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be 18 years or older.
The Bankwest Offset Transaction Account is an account for personal customers who are over 18 years of age.

You may only open a Bankwest Offset Transaction Account if, at the time of opening the account, you request that it be linked to an eligible Bankwest home loan where: the Bankwest home loan has been disbursed; or a home loan application has been made but the home loan has not yet been disbursed.

Customers with an existing Complete Variable Home Loan or Complete Fixed Home Loan can open a single or joint Offset account via the mobile app. If you open the account as part of your home loan application, over the phone or via the branch network, the maximum number of account holders on this account is limited to the number of account holders of the linked home loan.
There is a limit of nine offset accounts that can be linked to one eligible loan account, whether as a single or joint account holder.

fees.name: Overseas ATM Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No Bankwest-charged overseas ATM access fees. The overseas bank may charge a fee for using their ATM.

fees.name: Offset Fee

discounts.description: If the Offset Transaction Account is linked to a Home Loan that is part of the Complete Home Loan Package, then the Offset Fee will be waived.

eligibility.additionalInfo: If the Offset Transaction Account is linked to a Home Loan that is part of the Complete Home Loan Package, then the Offset Fee is waived.

fees.additionalInfo: A monthly offset fee will be charged to the account on the first business day of each month, and is charged on each account open. The amount that will charge will depend on the home loan that this facility is linked to and will be stated on the loan contract. If the Offset is linked to a Home Loan that is part of the Complete Home Loan Package, then the Offset Fee is waived.

fees.name: Bankwest Duplicate Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Customers requesting a duplicate paper statement to be printed (including faxes) will be charged a duplicate statement fee of $2.50 per statement.

fees.name: Cheque Stop Payment
fees.additionalInfo: Fee to stop payment on an issued cheque. This fee is $25 when payment is stopped on a range of cheques.

fees.name: ATM Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No ATM fees when you use major bank ATMs Australia-wide.

data.name: Bankwest Offset Transaction Account
data.description: Pair an Offset Transaction Account with your eligible home loan, use it like an everyday bank or savings account, and you could save on your home loan interest.
